bug.summary: [BUG] Automata.py exception error. NameError: name (error) is not defined
bug.description: In Automata.py change line to pass to avoid exception error in /var/log/pwnagotchi.log and /var/log/syslog def _on_error(self, who, e): pass

comments.comment: Something with "NameError: name 'error' is not defined" in "in str(e): " It gets pretty annoying looking at the logs
